View My Alerts IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE As requested your News Alert for YHOO follows from E quityAlertcom Latin Recording Academy Teams With Yahoo En Espanol fo r Live Stream of Latin GRAMMY Winners AnnouncementDLive Press Conference to Announce Latin GRAMMYR Award Winners Can Only be Seen In Its Entirety on Internet LOS ANGELES Oct ENTERTAINMENT WIRE On Tuesday October the Latin Recording AcademyR will hold an international pre ss conference at the Conga Room in Los Angeles to announce the winners of t he nd Annual Latin GRAMMY AwardsR which were cancelled due to the events of September Nominated Latin artists will join Michael Greene Preside ntCEO of the Recording AcademyR and Latin Recording Academy and Enrique Fernandez Senior Vice President and Executive Director of the Latin Recor ding Academy in this muchanticipated event which will feature some of th e biggest names in Latin music Through an agreement with Yahoo en espanol these announcements will be available to view from start to finish live a nd in real time only on the Web at wwwlatingrammyyahoocom Viewers on the Web will have the opportunity to see their favorite artists receive and accept their Latin GRAMMY Awards The press conference which begins at am PST when the first name is read also will feature celebrity hosts an d special performances by top honorees After watching the talented nomi nees rehearse for their big night on September it was clear there were several breakout performances in the making said Greene Now thanks to our partnership with Yahoo music fans all over the world will have the o pportunity to watch these amazing artists get the recognition they deserve Working together with the Latin Recording Academy throughout the nd An nual Latin GRAMMY season Yahoo has been hosting a special site tingrammyyahoocom which gave fans an exclusive behindthescenes look at the event Yahoo en espanol and Yahoo Music have been pleased to prov ide our global audience with the entertainment and excitement of this speci al event as the official online host of the nd Annual Latin GRAMMY Awards said Jorge Consuegra general manager of Yahoo en espanol By webcastin g the press conference presenting the winners of these awards we continue to deliver the best of Latin music to music aficionados throughout the US Latin America and around the world Through Yahoos extensive global network music fans worldwide have had VIP access to the Latin GRAMMY Awards participants complete with nominee video clips video clips of spec ial moments at last years Latin GRAMMY Award Show and celebrity chats T he Latin Recording Academy is a membershipbased business organization comp osed of musicians producers and other creative and technical recording pro fessionals who are dedicated to improving the quality of life and cultural condition for Latin music and its makers In addition to producing the Lati n GRAMMY Awards to honor excellence in the recording arts and sciences the Latin Recording Academy provides educational and human services programs i n Latin countries CONTACT The Recording Academy Ron Roecker URL Todays News On The Net
